original_text: See what I will do! I will bring them back from the land in the north. Wherever they are, I will bring them back. A great crowd of my people will return. Blind people will be among them, and people who cannot walk well. There will be pregnant women and some who will very soon give birth. See what I will do! I will bring them back from the land in the north. Wherever they are, I will bring them back. A great crowd of my people will return. Blind people will be among them, and people who cannot walk well. There will be pregnant women and some who will very soon give birth. See what I will do!
korean_text: 보라 나는 그들을 북쪽 땅에서 인도하며 땅 끝에서부터 모으리라 그들 중에는 맹인과 다리 저는 사람과 잉태한 여인과 해산하는 여인이 함께 있으며 큰 무리를 이루어 이 곳으로 돌아오리라

sentences.original_text: I will bring them back from the land in the north.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북쪽 땅에서 그들을 돌아오게 하겠다.

sentences.original_text: Wherever they are, I will bring them back.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어디에 있든, 내가 그들을 돌아오게 하겠다.

sentences.original_text: A great crowd of my people will return.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성 큰 무리가 돌아올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Blind people will be among them,
and people who cannot walk well.
sentences.korean_translation: 잘 걷지 못하는 사람들도 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and some who will very soon give birth.
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 아이를 낳을 사람들도 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will bring them back from the land in the north.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북쪽 땅에서 그들을 돌아오게 하겠다.

sentences.original_text: Wherever they are, I will bring them back.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어디에 있든, 내가 그들을 돌아오게 하겠다.

sentences.original_text: A great crowd of my people will return.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성 큰 무리가 돌아올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Blind people will be among them,
and people who cannot walk well.
sentences.korean_translation: 잘 걷지 못하는 사람들도 있을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and some who will very soon give birth.
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 아이를 낳을 사람들도 있을 것이다.
